text: Khea (kx run) klaw wa “chan di rab man pheraa khwam ru khxng chan” k khea (kx run) miru dxk hrux wa nænxn xallxh di thrng thalay phu thi mi phlang ying kwa læa mi phrrkhphwk makkwa kxn hna khea nı stwrrsʹ kxn «læa brrda phu krathakhwamphid ca mi thuk sxbtham keiyw kab khwam phid tang «khxng phwk khea dxk hrux
